sentences.sentence: He looked at me and nodded, almost invisibly.
sentences.translation: 他看着我点了点头，几乎让人看不出来。

sentences.sentence: A thin coil of smoke rose almost invisibly into the sharp, bright sky.
sentences.translation: 一缕轻烟几乎不见踪迹地升上了耀眼的晴空。

sentences.sentence: Space travel can be so delightful but at the same time invisibly dangerous.
sentences.translation: 太空旅行是如此令人愉快，但同时又存在无形的危险。
